Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: vcboss
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Get an instance of VCBoss for the current UIViewController.

Extensions/UIViewController.html.name: UIViewController
Extensions/UIViewController.html.abstract: Set of UIViewController extensions to interact with VCBoss easily to make working with VCBoss easier.

Enums/VCBossError.html#/s:6VCBoss0A5Erro.name: dismissViewControllerNeverPresented
Enums/VCBossError.html#/s:6VCBoss0A5Erro.abstract: If you try to dismiss a UIViewController that was never presented using VCBoss. You either forgot to present it, or you used self.present() instead of self.vcboss.present() to present the UIViewController.

Enums/VCBossError.html#/s:6VCBoss0A5Erro.name: dismissViewControllerNotPresentedModally
Enums/VCBossError.html#/s:6VCBoss0A5Erro.abstract: If you try to dismiss a UIViewController that was not presented modally, this error is thrown. This UIViewController does not have an instance of presentingViewController.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC14viewC.name: viewController
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC14viewC.abstract: The UIViewController doing the presenting of other UIViewControllers modally or the UIViewController presented modally…or both.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC8instan.name: instance(for:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC8instan.abstract: Use to get instance of VCBoss for UIViewController. Internally, this class will get you a singleton of VCBoss for your UIViewController instance.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC28numVi.name: numViewControllersPresenting
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC28numVi.abstract: If you are interested to see how many UIViewControllers are in the stack of UIViewControllers to present modally.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7presen.name: present(_:animated:completion:force:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7presen.abstract: Present this UIViewController now if no other UIViewController is presented, or show it in the future when it’s turn is next.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC36prese.name: presentOnlyIfNothingAlreadyPresented(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC36prese.abstract: If another UIViewController is already being presented, ignore showing this one. Else, present it.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7replac.name: replace(with:animated:completion:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7replac.abstract: Take the currently shown UIViewController, dismiss it, and force show this new one immediately after.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7dismis.name: dismiss(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7dismis.abstract: Dismiss this UIViewController given. Then, present the next one in line if there is one.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC10dismi.name: dismissAll(animated:completion:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC10dismi.abstract: Dismiss the currently presented UIViewController and do not present anymore. Clear the stack to start over again.

Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7dismis.name: dismiss(animated:completion:)
Classes/VCBoss.html#/s:6VCBossAAC7dismis.abstract: Dismiss this UIViewController that was presented modally. This method internally calls .dismiss() on the presentingViewController’s VCBoss instance.

Classes/VCBoss.html.name: VCBoss
Classes/VCBoss.html.abstract: Class used by a UIViewController to manage presenting and dismissing of UIViewControllers in a safe way. iOS throws errors if you try to call self.present() inside of a UIViewController when another UIViewController is already being shown. Replace all of your existing self.present() calls with using VCBoss and be safe knowing only 1 ViewController will be shown at a time.
